document_data.mainbody:
Dualdons Wake Mead was an alcoholic drink brewed in the Ten-Towns of Icewind Dale.
The libation was sold as early as the , in the towns surrounding lake Maer Dualdon. The mead was also served at The Salty Dog tavern in Targos where it was one of the cheaper intoxicants available. Sold for four gold pieces at the bar by its portly proprietor Gohar who was happy to share the towns latest rumors with paying customers.
